item.title: Revamping mckoss.com
item.description: mckoss.com started it’s life on the internet since at least 1999 looking like this: mckoss.com in 1999 I even had a way of sending SMS messages to my pager-watch along with my old cell phone number on the internet for all to see. This page was all hand-crafted by me; it may not have even had any css in it for all I can tell. Just some align=left, h1, <i> tags, etc.
